item.title: Coronavirus Unemployment Graph
item.description: This graph shows how the coronavirus lockdown increase the number of unemployment. This is my replication of Quoctrung Bui graph published in New York Times using HTML and D3. This is a homework that I did for Data Visualization PPHA 30560 class by Quoctrung Bui in class at The University …
item.dc:creator: Boni Oloff

item.title: Decline Of Farming Jobs Graph
item.description: This graph shows that the proportion of farming job decrease drastically, while other kind of jobs increase. This is my replication of Quoctrung Bui graph published in NPR using HTML and D3. This is a homework that I did for Data Visualization PPHA 30560 class by Quoctrung Bui in class …

item.title: Financial Inclusion and Economic Development
item.description:
An exploratory study to learn how micro aspects of financial inclusion play an important role in improving welfare. The analysis using Python with complete code in this repository.

This is a project of me @bonioloff and @harryhendharto for the Data and Programming for Public Policy II - PPHA 30536 class at …
item.dc:creator: Boni Oloff
